Title: Zegapain ADP
Description: ['Animation studio Sunrise has announced at AnimeJapan 2016 that its 2006 mecha anime series ', Zegapain, ' will be re-edited into a movie titled ', Zegapain ADP, '. The movie will also include new scenes not present in the TV anime.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: MAL News)']

Voices: ['Hanazawa, Kana', 'Asanuma, Shintaro', 'Kawasumi, Ayako', 'Park, Romi', 'Tsuboi, Tomohiro', 'Makino, Yui', 'Watanabe, Akeno']
